title: Add 100-hour YTT option to directory filters and informational content

requirements.summary: Add a 100-hour option to the Directory page training-hours filter so users can filter schools by 100-hour YTT programs.
acceptanceCriteria: On `/` (`frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx`), the filter checklist includes: 100 Hours, 200 Hours, 300 Hours, 500 Hours.
Selecting 100 Hours adds it to the active filters badges and filters the school results based on trainings with `hours == 100` (using the existing `useSchools(selectedHours)` behavior).
User-facing labels remain in English and match the existing pattern (e.g., "100 Hours").

file_operations.description: Update the training-hours checklist to render [100, 200, 300, 500] (instead of [200, 300, 500]) and ensure toggling 100 updates badges and continues to pass selectedHours into useSchools for filtering. Use the existing shadcn-ui Checkbox/Label/Badge components for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Update Directory hero and directory info copy to include 100-hour YTT alongside 200/300/500-hour categories.
acceptanceCriteria: The Directory hero subtitle on `frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx` mentions 100, 200, 300, and 500-hour teacher training programs (English text).
In `frontend/src/components/directory/DirectoryInfoSections.tsx`, any text that currently lists only 200/300/500 is updated to include 100 as well (English text).

file_operations.description: Revise the hero subtitle copy to explicitly mention 100, 200, 300, and 500-hour teacher training programs (English), keeping the existing layout and shadcn-ui Badge/Button styling intact; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update any informational text that enumerates hour levels (e.g., the 'Browse Programs' card copy) to include 100-hour offerings alongside 200/300/500 (English). Keep the existing shadcn-ui Card/Badge typography and spacing consistent; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a 100-Hour YTT entry to the “Training Hour Levels Explained” section using the existing Card-based layout and styling.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/directory/DirectoryInfoSections.tsx` includes a visible "100-Hour YTT" entry in the Training Hour Levels section, styled consistently with the existing 200/300/500 cards.
All new content is in English and does not introduce new backend dependencies.

file_operations.description: Extend the Training Hour Levels Explained grid to include a new shadcn-ui Card for "100-Hour YTT" with copy and bullet points consistent with the existing 200/300/500 cards. Adjust the grid column classes if needed so four cards display cleanly while preserving current styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
